alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 12:14AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Aitkin, southwestern St. Louis and northwestern Carlton Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Jacobson, to near Big Sandy Lake, to near McGregor, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tamarack and Floodwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
